short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poised on web support for modern browsers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Poised is an AI-powered speech coach that gives you real-time and retrospective feedback on your online meetings.

Get live feedback during the meeting to course correct your speech and stay on track with your communication goals.

Get a summary and detailed recap of every meeting so you can understand and retrospect on your performance at a glance and get personalized tips for next time. Review critical moments in the meeting along with the video and transcripts.

Access curated educational content and receive personalized lesson plans from experts.
Poised runs discreetly in the background, so nobody else will know youâ€™re using it during your conversations.

Poised works with Zoom, Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Google Meet, among other platforms.
